QuestData.Title: Shard of Vorgos
QuestData.Description: According to the wyrmtongue servant, there is a portal that will take you into the Burning Legion command ship. However, the portal is locked to those without the keys.$b$bThe first key shard is held by an Ered'ruin known as Vorgos. He resides within the Fel Breach, which is at the end of the Arcway.$b$bSlay Vorgos and place the key shard into its position next to the portal.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Vorgos possesses one of the keys to the Lightbreaker. We must take it from him.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The Shard of Vargos pulses in your hand.>
QuestData.RewardText: <The Shard of Vorgos locks into position next to the portal. Swirling fel energy collects around the shard, filling the room with an ominous, dark presence.>
